title: King of Beasts
description: To any outsider, the forests of Harvey’s Hill look no different than any other forest. But at night, when the clock strikes ten, everyone in town must be indoors. Because if you’re not indoors, you’re not safe.One night, Charlotte makes a She doesn’t make it home before ten. It’s a mistake that should have led to her death at the hands of the beasts. But fortunately for Charlotte, she is no ordinary human; her runes keep the beasts at bay.Instead of becoming their sustenance, she is captured by Gabriel—their King. Enamored with her beauty, he takes her with him and tries to take her as his own, but she’s feistier than he could have ever imagined. Soon, love and passion begin to take their course—but so does something else. Sinister things are in the works, slowly pushing Charlotte and Gabe to their breaking point. Everything—even their sanity—begins to fall apart.What lies under the surface of this strange, unsettling town? Will the King of Beasts succeed in claiming his queen? Or will Charlotte regain her freedom and escape from the beasts?One thing’s for Always be indoors before ten.
author: Jamiee Lynne
